rule.ruleDesc: Get file.save info for wizard use
rule.conditionDesc: ( status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != "Suspended")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Get file.save info for wizard use (when ( status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != "Suspended"))

rule.conditionDesc: ( status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != "Suspended")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Run the "Request Suspend" wizard. (when ( status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != "Suspended"))
